channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-37945|2024-08-02T17:23:27.775Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20single%20sign%20on%28sso%29%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin 2.1.0 through 2.3.0 (both inclusive) allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to download a string representation of the current security realm.

item.title: CVE-2023-32995|2024-08-02T15:32:46.502Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20single%20sign%20on%28sso%29%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin 2.0.0 and earlier allows attackers to send an HTTP POST request with JSON body containing attacker-specified content, to miniOrange's API for sending emails.

item.title: CVE-2023-32996|2024-08-02T15:32:46.478Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20single%20sign%20on%28sso%29%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin 2.0.0 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to send an HTTP POST request with JSON body containing attacker-specified content, to miniOrange's API for sending emails.

item.title: CVE-2023-32992|2024-08-02T15:32:46.552Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20single%20sign%20on%28sso%29%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin 2.0.2 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to send an HTTP request to an attacker-specified URL and parse the response as XML, or parse a local file on the Jenkins controller as XML.

item.title: CVE-2023-32991|2024-08-02T15:32:46.473Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20single%20sign%20on%28sso%29%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin 2.0.2 and earlier allows attackers to send an HTTP request to an attacker-specified URL and parse the response as XML, or parse a local file on the Jenkins controller as XML.

item.title: CVE-2023-32993|2024-08-02T15:32:46.556Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20single%20sign%20on%28sso%29%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin 2.0.2 and earlier does not perform hostname validation when connecting to miniOrange or the configured IdP to retrieve SAML metadata, which could be abused using a man-in-the-middle attack to intercept these connections.

item.title: CVE-2023-32994|2024-08-02T15:32:46.753Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20single%20sign%20on%28sso%29%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SAML Single Sign On(SSO) Plugin 2.1.0 and earlier unconditionally disables SSL/TLS certificate validation for connections to miniOrange or the configured IdP to retrieve SAML metadata, which could be abused using a man-in-the-middle attack to intercept these connections.
